H0.text: Which British institution was set up by Royal Charter in 1927. The British Museum

H1.text: Which British institution was set up by Royal Charter in 1927. The University of London

H2.text: Which British institution was set up by Royal Charter in 1927. The British Library

H3.text: Which British institution was set up by Royal Charter in 1927. Bbc

A4.text: The British Broadcasting Corporation came into existence on 1 January 1927.

A5.text: The British Broadcasting Corporation (BBC) is a British public-service broadcaster headquartered at Broadcasting House in London, England. Originally established in 1922 as the British Broadcasting Company, it evolved into its current state with its current name on New Year's Day 1927.
